price: Ɛyε Da a, ͻkra bi nni tumi a ͻde bεboa ͻkra bi wͻ biribi ho; na saa Da no tumi nyinaa wͻ Nyankopͻn.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
